blood_possessed.description: This monster is possessed by the curse of blood. It will attack anything not struck by it.

humanoid.description: Either a human, or close enough to it.

goblin.description: Greedy little creatures who strive to def

feline.description: Cats. These might be tempting, but not safe to cuddle.

canine.description: Man's best friend... once upon a time.

child.description: A young specimen, not yet matured.

fire_explode.description: Explodes when put into contact with fire!
